meanings.sent1: After the lecture, the teacher recondensed the main points for the students.
meanings.sent2: I had to recondense my essay to fit the word limit.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to recondense the sauce, but it ended up too thick!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts recondensed into a clear plan of action.
meanings.sent5: The fog recondensed into dew on the grass.

meanings.sent1: The recondensed milk was perfect for baking.
meanings.sent2: The recondensed version of the book was easier to carry around.
meanings.sent3: The recondensed puzzle pieces were harder to separate.
meanings.sent4: The recondensed crowd made it hard to move through the street.
meanings.sent5: The recondensed clay was ideal for sculpting.
